GP10bhp_04u:0: BhP_04.01.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.01.001/1 manos tu śatarūpāyāṃ tisraḥ kanyāś ca jajñire

GP10bhp_04u:45: BhP_04.01.027/3 te brahma-viṣṇu-giriśāḥ praṇato 'smy ahaṃ vas BhP_04.01.027/4 tebhyaḥ ka eva bhavatāṃ ma ihopahūtaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:183: BhP_04.02.033/2 niścakrāma tataḥ kiñcid vimanā iva sānugaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:185: BhP_04.02.034/2 saṃvidhāya maheṣvāsa yatrejya ṛṣabho hariḥ BhP_04.02.035/1 āplutyāvabhṛthaṃ yatra gaṅgā yamunayānvitā
GP10bhp_04u:186: BhP_04.02.035/2 virajenātmanā sarve svaṃ svaṃ dhāma yayus tataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:187: BhP_04.03.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.03.001/1 sadā vidviṣator evaṃ kālo vai dhriyamāṇayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:189: BhP_04.03.002/1 yadābhiṣikto dakṣas tu brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā BhP_04.03.002/2 prajāpatīnāṃ sarveṣām ādhipatye smayo 'bhavat
GP10bhp_04u:190: BhP_04.03.003/1 iṣṭvā sa vājapeyena brahmiṣṭhān abhibhūya ca
GP10bhp_04u:193: BhP_04.03.004/2 āsan kṛta-svastyayanās tat-patnyaś ca sa-bhartṛkāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:194: BhP_04.03.005/1 tad upaśrutya nabhasi khe-carāṇāṃ prajalpatām
GP10bhp_04u:199: BhP_04.03.007/2 patiṃ bhūta-patiṃ devam autsukyād abhyabhāṣata
GP10bhp_04u:200: BhP_04.03.008/0 saty uvāca BhP_04.03.008/1 prajāpates te śvaśurasya sāmprataṃ niryāpito yajña-mahotsavaḥ kila
GP10bhp_04u:201: BhP_04.03.008/2 vayaṃ ca tatrābhisarāma vāma te yady arthitāmī vibudhā vrajanti hi BhP_04.03.009/1 tasmin bhaginyo mama bhartṛbhiḥ svakair dhruvaṃ gamiṣyanti
GP10bhp_04u:203: BhP_04.03.009/2 ahaṃ ca tasmin bhavatābhikāmaye sahopanītaṃ paribarham
GP10bhp_04u:205: BhP_04.03.010/1 tatra svasṝr me nanu bhartṛ-sammitā mātṛ-ṣvasṝḥ
GP10bhp_04u:206: klinna-dhiyaṃ ca mātaram BhP_04.03.010/2 drakṣye cirotkaṇṭha-manā maharṣibhir unnīyamānaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:208: BhP_04.03.011/1 tvayy etad āścaryam ajātma-māyayā vinirmitaṃ bhāti guṇa-trayātmakam
GP10bhp_04u:209: BhP_04.03.011/2 tathāpy ahaṃ yoṣid atattva-vic ca te dīnā didṛkṣe bhava me
GP10bhp_04u:211: BhP_04.03.012/1 paśya prayāntīr abhavānya-yoṣito 'py alaṅkṛtāḥ kānta-sakhā
GP10bhp_04u:213: BhP_04.03.012/2 yāsāṃ vrajadbhiḥ śiti-kaṇṭha maṇḍitaṃ nabho vimānaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:215: BhP_04.03.013/1 kathaṃ sutāyāḥ pitṛ-geha-kautukaṃ niśamya dehaḥ sura-varya
GP10bhp_04u:217: BhP_04.03.013/2 anāhutā apy abhiyanti sauhṛdaṃ bhartur guror deha-kṛtaś ca ketanam BhP_04.03.014/1 tan me prasīdedam amartya vāñchitaṃ kartuṃ bhavān kāruṇiko batārhati
GP10bhp_04u:218: BhP_04.03.014/2 tvayātmano 'rdhe 'ham adabhra-cakṣuṣā nirūpitā mānugṛhāṇa yācitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:219: BhP_04.03.015/0 ṛṣir uvāca BhP_04.03.015/1 evaṃ giritraḥ priyayābhibhāṣitaḥ pratyabhyadhatta prahasan suhṛt-priyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:220: BhP_04.03.015/2 saṃsmārito marma-bhidaḥ kuvāg-iṣūn yān āha ko viśva-sṛjāṃ
GP10bhp_04u:223: BhP_04.03.016/1 tvayoditaṃ śobhanam eva śobhane anāhutā apy abhiyanti bandhuṣu BhP_04.03.016/2 te yady anutpādita-doṣa-dṛṣṭayo balīyasānātmya-madena
GP10bhp_04u:227: BhP_04.03.017/2 smṛtau hatāyāṃ bhṛta-māna-durdṛśaḥ stabdhā na paśyanti hi dhāma bhūyasām
GP10bhp_04u:228: BhP_04.03.018/1 naitādṛśānāṃ sva-jana-vyapekṣayā gṛhān pratīyād anavasthitātmanām
GP10bhp_04u:231: BhP_04.03.019/1 tathāribhir na vyathate śilīmukhaiḥ śete 'rditāṅgo
GP10bhp_04u:232: hṛdayena dūyatā BhP_04.03.019/2 svānāṃ yathā vakra-dhiyāṃ duruktibhir divā-niśaṃ tapyati
GP10bhp_04u:234: BhP_04.03.020/1 vyaktaṃ tvam utkṛṣṭa-gateḥ prajāpateḥ priyātmajānām asi
GP10bhp_04u:236: BhP_04.03.020/2 tathāpi mānaṃ na pituḥ prapatsyase mad-āśrayāt kaḥ paritapyate yataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:239: BhP_04.03.021/2 akalpa eṣām adhiroḍhum añjasā paraṃ padaṃ dveṣṭi yathāsurā harim
GP10bhp_04u:242: BhP_04.03.022/2 prājñaiḥ parasmai puruṣāya cetasā guhā-śayāyaiva na
GP10bhp_04u:244: BhP_04.03.023/1 sattvaṃ viśuddhaṃ vasudeva-śabditaṃ yad īyate tatra pumān apāvṛtaḥ BhP_04.03.023/2 sattve ca tasmin bhagavān vāsudevo hy adhokṣajo me namasā
GP10bhp_04u:246: BhP_04.03.024/1 tat te nirīkṣyo na pitāpi deha-kṛd dakṣo mama dviṭ
GP10bhp_04u:247: tad-anuvratāś ca ye BhP_04.03.024/2 yo viśvasṛg-yajña-gataṃ varoru mām anāgasaṃ durvacasākarot tiraḥ BhP_04.03.025/1 yadi vrajiṣyasy atihāya mad-vaco bhadraṃ bhavatyā na tato bhaviṣyati BhP_04.03.025/2 sambhāvitasya sva-janāt parābhavo yadā sa sadyo maraṇāya kalpate
GP10bhp_04u:248: BhP_04.04.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.04.001/1 etāvad uktvā virarāma śaṅkaraḥ patny-aṅga-nāśaṃ hy ubhayatra cintayan
GP10bhp_04u:249: BhP_04.04.001/2 suhṛd-didṛkṣuḥ pariśaṅkitā bhavān niṣkrāmatī nirviśatī dvidhāsa sā
GP10bhp_04u:251: BhP_04.04.002/2 bhavaṃ bhavāny apratipūruṣaṃ ruṣā pradhakṣyatīvaikṣata jāta-vepathuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:252: BhP_04.04.003/1 tato viniḥśvasya satī vihāya taṃ śokena roṣeṇa ca dūyatā
GP10bhp_04u:254: BhP_04.04.003/2 pitror agāt straiṇa-vimūḍha-dhīr gṛhān premṇātmano yo
GP10bhp_04u:256: BhP_04.04.004/1 tām anvagacchan druta-vikramāṃ satīm ekāṃ tri-netrānucarāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:262: BhP_04.04.005/2 gītāyanair dundubhi-śaṅkha-veṇubhir vṛṣendram āropya viṭaṅkitā yayuḥ BhP_04.04.006/1 ābrahma-ghoṣorjita-yajña-vaiśasaṃ viprarṣi-juṣṭaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:265: yajanaṃ samāviśat BhP_04.04.007/1 tām āgatāṃ tatra na kaścanādriyad vimānitāṃ yajña-kṛto
GP10bhp_04u:266: bhayāj janaḥ BhP_04.04.007/2 ṛte svasṝr vai jananīṃ ca sādarāḥ premāśru-kaṇṭhyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:267: pariṣasvajur mudā BhP_04.04.008/1 saudarya-sampraśna-samartha-vārtayā mātrā ca mātṛ-ṣvasṛbhiś ca sādaram BhP_04.04.008/2 dattāṃ saparyāṃ varam āsanaṃ ca sā nādatta pitrāpratinanditā satī
GP10bhp_04u:268: BhP_04.04.009/1 arudra-bhāgaṃ tam avekṣya cādhvaraṃ pitrā ca deve
GP10bhp_04u:270: BhP_04.04.009/2 anādṛtā yajña-sadasy adhīśvarī cukopa lokān iva dhakṣyatī ruṣā
GP10bhp_04u:273: BhP_04.04.010/2 sva-tejasā bhūta-gaṇān samutthitān nigṛhya devī jagato
GP10bhp_04u:275: BhP_04.04.011/0 devy uvāca BhP_04.04.011/1 na yasya loke 'sty atiśāyanaḥ priyas tathāpriyo
GP10bhp_04u:277: BhP_04.04.011/2 tasmin samastātmani mukta-vairake ṛte bhavantaṃ katamaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:279: BhP_04.04.012/1 doṣān pareṣāṃ hi guṇeṣu sādhavo gṛhṇanti kecin na bhavādṛśo dvija BhP_04.04.012/2 guṇāṃś ca phalgūn bahulī-kariṣṇavo mahattamās teṣv avidad
GP10bhp_04u:280: bhavān agham BhP_04.04.013/1 nāścaryam etad yad asatsu sarvadā mahad-vinindā
GP10bhp_04u:282: BhP_04.04.013/2 serṣyaṃ mahāpūruṣa-pāda-pāṃsubhir nirasta-tejaḥsu tad eva śobhanam
GP10bhp_04u:283: BhP_04.04.014/1 yad dvy-akṣaraṃ nāma gireritaṃ nṛṇāṃ sakṛt prasaṅgād agham
GP10bhp_04u:285: BhP_04.04.014/2 pavitra-kīrtiṃ tam alaṅghya-śāsanaṃ bhavān aho dveṣṭi
GP10bhp_04u:286: śivaṃ śivetaraḥ BhP_04.04.015/1 yat-pāda-padmaṃ mahatāṃ mano-'libhir niṣevitaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:288: BhP_04.04.015/2 lokasya yad varṣati cāśiṣo 'rthinas tasmai bhavān druhyati
GP10bhp_04u:290: BhP_04.04.016/1 kiṃ vā śivākhyam aśivaṃ na vidus tvad anye brahmādayas tam avakīrya jaṭāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:291: BhP_04.04.016/2 tan-mālya-bhasma-nṛkapāly avasat piśācair ye mūrdhabhir dadhati tac-caraṇāvasṛṣṭam
GP10bhp_04u:292: BhP_04.04.017/1 karṇau pidhāya nirayād yad akalpa īśe dharmāvitary asṛṇibhir nṛbhir asyamāne
GP10bhp_04u:293: BhP_04.04.017/2 chindyāt prasahya ruśatīm asatīṃ prabhuś cej jihvām asūn api tato visṛjet sa dharmaḥ BhP_04.04.018/1 atas tavotpannam idaṃ kalevaraṃ na dhārayiṣye
GP10bhp_04u:295: BhP_04.04.018/2 jagdhasya mohād dhi viśuddhim andhaso jugupsitasyoddharaṇaṃ pracakṣate BhP_04.04.019/1 na veda-vādān anuvartate matiḥ sva eva loke ramato
GP10bhp_04u:297: BhP_04.04.019/2 yathā gatir deva-manuṣyayoḥ pṛthak sva eva dharme na paraṃ
GP10bhp_04u:298: kṣipet sthitaḥ BhP_04.04.020/1 karma pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttam apy ṛtaṃ vede
GP10bhp_04u:300: BhP_04.04.020/2 virodhi tad yaugapadaika-kartari dvayaṃ tathā brahmaṇi
GP10bhp_04u:301: karma narcchati BhP_04.04.021/1 mā vaḥ padavyaḥ pitar asmad-āsthitā yā yajña-śālāsu na
GP10bhp_04u:305: BhP_04.04.022/1 naitena dehena hare kṛtāgaso dehodbhavenālam alaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:307: BhP_04.04.022/2 vrīḍā mamābhūt kujana-prasaṅgatas taj janma dhig yo mahatām avadya-kṛt
GP10bhp_04u:308: BhP_04.04.023/1 gotraṃ tvadīyaṃ bhagavān vṛṣadhvajo dākṣāyaṇīty āha yadā sudurmanāḥ BhP_04.04.023/2 vyapeta-narma-smitam āśu tadāhaṃ vyutsrakṣya etat kuṇapaṃ tvad-aṅgajam
GP10bhp_04u:309: BhP_04.04.024/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.04.024/1 ity adhvare dakṣam anūdya śatru-han kṣitāv udīcīṃ niṣasāda
GP10bhp_04u:311: BhP_04.04.024/2 spṛṣṭvā jalaṃ pīta-dukūla-saṃvṛtā nimīlya dṛg yoga-pathaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:313: BhP_04.04.025/1 kṛtvā samānāv anilau jitāsanā sodānam utthāpya ca
GP10bhp_04u:315: BhP_04.04.025/2 śanair hṛdi sthāpya dhiyorasi sthitaṃ kaṇṭhād bhruvor madhyam aninditānayat
GP10bhp_04u:316: BhP_04.04.026/1 evaṃ sva-dehaṃ mahatāṃ mahīyasā muhuḥ samāropitam aṅkam ādarāt
GP10bhp_04u:317: BhP_04.04.026/2 jihāsatī dakṣa-ruṣā manasvinī dadhāra gātreṣv
GP10bhp_04u:319: BhP_04.04.027/1 tataḥ sva-bhartuś caraṇāmbujāsavaṃ jagad-guroś cintayatī na cāparam
GP10bhp_04u:320: BhP_04.04.027/2 dadarśa deho hata-kalmaṣaḥ satī sadyaḥ prajajvāla
GP10bhp_04u:322: BhP_04.04.028/1 tat paśyatāṃ khe bhuvi cādbhutaṃ mahad hā heti vādaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:323: sumahān ajāyata BhP_04.04.028/2 hanta priyā daivatamasya devī jahāv asūn kena satī prakopitā
GP10bhp_04u:324: BhP_04.04.029/1 aho anātmyaṃ mahad asya paśyata prajāpater yasya carācaraṃ prajāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:325: BhP_04.04.029/2 jahāv asūn yad-vimatātmajā satī manasvinī mānam abhīkṣṇam arhati BhP_04.04.030/1 so 'yaṃ durmarṣa-hṛdayo brahma-dhruk ca loke 'pakīrtiṃ
GP10bhp_04u:326: mahatīm avāpsyati BhP_04.04.030/2 yad-aṅgajāṃ svāṃ puruṣa-dviḍ udyatāṃ na pratyaṣedhan
GP10bhp_04u:328: BhP_04.04.031/1 vadaty evaṃ jane satyā dṛṣṭvāsu-tyāgam adbhutam
GP10bhp_04u:329: BhP_04.04.031/2 dakṣaṃ tat-pārṣadā hantum udatiṣṭhann udāyudhāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:330: BhP_04.04.032/1 teṣām āpatatāṃ vegaṃ niśāmya bhagavān bhṛguḥ
GP10bhp_04u:331: BhP_04.04.032/2 yajña-ghna-ghnena yajuṣā dakṣiṇāgnau juhāva ha
GP10bhp_04u:332: BhP_04.04.033/1 adhvaryuṇā hūyamāne devā utpetur ojasā BhP_04.04.033/2 ṛbhavo nāma tapasā somaṃ prāptāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:333: BhP_04.04.034/1 tair alātāyudhaiḥ sarve pramathāḥ saha-guhyakāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:334: BhP_04.04.034/2 hanyamānā diśo bhejur uśadbhir brahma-tejasā
GP10bhp_04u:335: BhP_04.05.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.05.001/1 bhavo bhavānyā nidhanaṃ prajāpater asat-kṛtāyā avagamya nāradāt BhP_04.05.001/2 sva-pārṣada-sainyaṃ ca tad-adhvararbhubhir vidrāvitaṃ krodham apāram ādadhe
GP10bhp_04u:336: BhP_04.05.002/1 kruddhaḥ sudaṣṭauṣṭha-puṭaḥ sa dhūr-jaṭir jaṭāṃ
GP10bhp_04u:338: BhP_04.05.002/2 utkṛtya rudraḥ sahasotthito hasan gambhīra-nādo visasarja tāṃ bhuvi
GP10bhp_04u:339: BhP_04.05.003/1 tato 'tikāyas tanuvā spṛśan divaṃ sahasra-bāhur ghana-ruk
GP10bhp_04u:343: BhP_04.05.004/1 taṃ kiṃ karomīti gṛṇantam āha baddhāñjaliṃ bhagavān
GP10bhp_04u:345: BhP_04.05.004/2 dakṣaṃ sa-yajñaṃ jahi mad-bhaṭānāṃ tvam agraṇī rudra
GP10bhp_04u:346: bhaṭāṃśako me BhP_04.05.005/1 ājñapta evaṃ kupitena manyunā sa deva-devaṃ paricakrame vibhum BhP_04.05.005/2 mene-tadātmānam asaṅga-raṃhasā mahīyasāṃ tāta sahaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:348: BhP_04.05.006/1 anvīyamānaḥ sa tu rudra-pārṣadair bhṛśaṃ nadadbhir vyanadat subhairavam BhP_04.05.006/2 udyamya śūlaṃ jagad-antakāntakaṃ samprādravad
GP10bhp_04u:350: BhP_04.05.007/1 athartvijo yajamānaḥ sadasyāḥ kakubhy udīcyāṃ prasamīkṣya
GP10bhp_04u:352: BhP_04.05.007/2 tamaḥ kim etat kuta etad rajo 'bhūd iti dvijā dvija-patnyaś ca dadhyuḥ BhP_04.05.008/1 vātā na vānti na hi santi dasyavaḥ prācīna-barhir jīvati
GP10bhp_04u:354: BhP_04.05.008/2 gāvo na kālyanta idaṃ kuto rajo loko 'dhunā kiṃ pralayāya kalpate
GP10bhp_04u:355: BhP_04.05.009/1 prasūti-miśrāḥ striya udvigna-cittā ūcur vipāko vṛjinasyaiva tasya BhP_04.05.009/2 yat paśyantīnāṃ duhitṝṇāṃ prajeśaḥ sutāṃ satīm avadadhyāv anāgām BhP_04.05.010/1 yas tv anta-kāle vyupta-jaṭā-kalāpaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:359: BhP_04.05.011/1 amarṣayitvā tam asahya-tejasaṃ manyu-plutaṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:361: BhP_04.05.011/2 karāla-daṃṣṭrābhir udasta-bhāgaṇaṃ syāt svasti kiṃ
GP10bhp_04u:362: kopayato vidhātuḥ BhP_04.05.012/1 bahv evam udvigna-dṛśocyamāne janena dakṣasya muhur
GP10bhp_04u:364: BhP_04.05.012/2 utpetur utpātatamāḥ sahasraśo bhayāvahā divi bhūmau ca paryak BhP_04.05.013/1 tāvat sa rudrānucarair mahā-makho nānāyudhair vāmanakair udāyudhaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:365: BhP_04.05.013/2 piṅgaiḥ piśaṅgair makarodarānanaiḥ paryādravadbhir vidurānvarudhyata BhP_04.05.014/1 kecid babhañjuḥ prāg-vaṃśaṃ patnī-śālāṃ tathāpare
GP10bhp_04u:366: BhP_04.05.014/2 sada āgnīdhra-śālāṃ ca tad-vihāraṃ mahānasam
GP10bhp_04u:368: BhP_04.05.015/2 kuṇḍeṣv amūtrayan kecid bibhidur vedi-mekhalāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:369: BhP_04.05.016/1 abādhanta munīn anye eke patnīr atarjayan
GP10bhp_04u:370: BhP_04.05.016/2 apare jagṛhur devān pratyāsannān palāyitān BhP_04.05.017/1 bhṛguṃ babandha maṇimān vīrabhadraḥ prajāpatim BhP_04.05.017/2 caṇḍeśaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ devaṃ bhagaṃ nandīśvaro 'grahīt
GP10bhp_04u:371: BhP_04.05.018/1 sarva evartvijo dṛṣṭvā sadasyāḥ sa-divaukasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:372: BhP_04.05.018/2 tair ardyamānāḥ subhṛśaṃ grāvabhir naikadhādravan BhP_04.05.019/1 juhvataḥ sruva-hastasya śmaśrūṇi bhagavān bhavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:373: BhP_04.05.019/2 bhṛgor luluñce sadasi yo 'hasac chmaśru darśayan BhP_04.05.020/1 bhagasya netre bhagavān pātitasya ruṣā bhuvi
GP10bhp_04u:374: BhP_04.05.020/2 ujjahāra sada-stho 'kṣṇā yaḥ śapantam asūsucat
GP10bhp_04u:375: BhP_04.05.021/1 pūṣṇo hy apātayad dantān kāliṅgasya yathā balaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:376: BhP_04.05.021/2 śapyamāne garimaṇi yo 'hasad darśayan dataḥ BhP_04.05.022/1 ākramyorasi dakṣasya śita-dhāreṇa hetinā
GP10bhp_04u:377: BhP_04.05.022/2 chindann api tad uddhartuṃ nāśaknot tryambakas tadā
GP10bhp_04u:378: BhP_04.05.023/1 śastrair astrānvitair evam anirbhinna-tvacaṃ haraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:379: BhP_04.05.023/2 vismayaṃ param āpanno dadhyau paśupatiś ciram
GP10bhp_04u:380: BhP_04.05.024/1 dṛṣṭvā saṃjñapanaṃ yogaṃ paśūnāṃ sa patir makhe
GP10bhp_04u:381: BhP_04.05.024/2 yajamāna-paśoḥ kasya kāyāt tenāharac chiraḥ

GP10bhp_04u:603: BhP_04.07.050/1 ahaṃ brahmā ca śarvaś ca jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ param BhP_04.07.050/2 ātmeśvara upadraṣṭā svayan-dṛg aviśeṣaṇaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:644: BhP_04.08.013/2 garbhe tvaṃ sādhayātmānaṃ yadīcchasi nṛpāsanam BhP_04.08.014/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.08.014/1 mātuḥ sapatnyāḥ sa durukti-viddhaḥ śvasan ruṣā daṇḍa-hato

GP10bhp_04u:939: BhP_04.10.012/2 icchantas tat pratīkartum ayutānāṃ trayodaśa BhP_04.10.013/1 auttānapādiḥ sa tadā śastra-varṣeṇa bhūriṇā
GP10bhp_04u:940: BhP_04.10.013/2 na evādṛśyatācchanna āsāreṇa yathā giriḥ BhP_04.10.014/1 hāhā-kāras tadaivāsīt siddhānāṃ divi paśyatām

GP10bhp_04u:954: BhP_04.10.021/1 apaśyamānaḥ sa tadātatāyinaṃ mahā-mṛdhe kañcana mānavottamaḥ BhP_04.10.021/2 purīṃ didṛkṣann api nāviśad dviṣāṃ na māyināṃ veda cikīrṣitaṃ janaḥ BhP_04.10.022/1 iti bruvaṃś citra-rathaḥ sva-sārathiṃ yattaḥ pareṣāṃ pratiyoga-śaṅkitaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:965: BhP_04.10.027/2 āsasāda mahā-hrādaḥ kalpānta iva bhīṣaṇaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1326: BhP_04.15.021/2 megha-nirhrādayā vācā prahasann idam abravīt

GP10bhp_04u:1329: BhP_04.15.023/1 tasmāt parokṣe 'smad-upaśrutāny alaṃ kariṣyatha stotram

GP10bhp_04u:1335: BhP_04.15.024/2 te 'syābhaviṣyann iti vipralabdho janāvahāsaṃ kumatir na veda
GP10bhp_04u:1336: BhP_04.15.025/1 prabhavo hy ātmanaḥ stotraṃjugupsanty api viśrutāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1337: BhP_04.15.025/2 hrīmantaḥ paramodārāḥ pauruṣaṃ vā vigarhitam BhP_04.15.026/1 vayaṃ tv aviditā loke sūtādyāpi varīmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1338: BhP_04.15.026/2 karmabhiḥ katham ātmānaṃ gāpayiṣyāma bālavat BhP_04.16.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.16.001/1 iti bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ gāyakā muni-coditāḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1354: BhP_04.16.007/2 bhūtānāṃ karuṇaḥ śaśvad ārtānāṃ kṣiti-vṛttimān
GP10bhp_04u:1355: BhP_04.16.008/1 deve 'varṣaty asau devo naradeva-vapur hariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1356: BhP_04.16.008/2 kṛcchra-prāṇāḥ prajā hy eṣa rakṣiṣyaty añjasendravat BhP_04.16.009/1 āpyāyayaty asau lokaṃ vadanāmṛta-mūrtinā
GP10bhp_04u:1364: BhP_04.16.012/1 antar bahiś ca bhūtānāṃ paśyan karmāṇi cāraṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1365: BhP_04.16.012/2 udāsīna ivādhyakṣo vāyur ātmeva dehinām BhP_04.16.013/1 nādaṇḍyaṃ daṇḍayaty eṣa sutam ātma-dviṣām api
GP10bhp_04u:1366: BhP_04.16.013/2 daṇḍayaty ātmajam api daṇḍyaṃ dharma-pathe sthitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1368: BhP_04.16.014/2 vartate bhagavān arko yāvat tapati go-gaṇaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1369: BhP_04.16.015/1 rañjayiṣyati yal lokam ayam ātma-viceṣṭitaiḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1373: BhP_04.16.017/1 mātṛ-bhaktiḥ para-strīṣu patnyām ardha ivātmanaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1374: BhP_04.16.017/2 prajāsu pitṛvat snigdhaḥ kiṅkaro brahma-vādinām
GP10bhp_04u:1377: BhP_04.16.019/1 ayaṃ tu sākṣād bhagavāṃs try-adhīśaḥ kūṭa-stha ātmā kalayāvatīrṇaḥ BhP_04.16.019/2 yasminn avidyā-racitaṃ nirarthakaṃ paśyanti nānātvam api pratītam BhP_04.16.020/1 ayaṃ bhuvo maṇḍalam odayādrer goptaika-vīro
GP10bhp_04u:1379: BhP_04.16.020/2 āsthāya jaitraṃ ratham ātta-cāpaḥ paryasyate dakṣiṇato yathārkaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1380: BhP_04.16.021/1 asmai nṛ-pālāḥ kila tatra tatra baliṃ hariṣyanti saloka-pālāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1381: BhP_04.16.021/2 maṃsyanta eṣāṃ striya ādi-rājaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ tad-yaśa
GP10bhp_04u:1383: BhP_04.16.022/1 ayaṃ mahīṃ gāṃ duduhe 'dhirājaḥ prajāpatir vṛtti-karaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1385: BhP_04.16.022/2 yo līlayādrīn sva-śarāsa-koṭyā bhindan samāṃ gām akarod yathendraḥ BhP_04.16.023/1 visphūrjayann āja-gavaṃ dhanuḥ svayaṃ yadācarat kṣmām aviṣahyam ājau
GP10bhp_04u:1386: BhP_04.16.023/2 tadā nililyur diśi diśy asanto lāṅgūlam udyamya yathā mṛgendraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1387: BhP_04.16.024/1 eṣo 'śvamedhāñ śatam ājahāra sarasvatī prādurabhāvi yatra BhP_04.16.024/2 ahārṣīd yasya hayaṃ purandaraḥ śata-kratuś carame vartamāne BhP_04.16.025/1 eṣa sva-sadmopavane sametya sanat-kumāraṃ bhagavantam ekam BhP_04.16.025/2 ārādhya bhaktyālabhatāmalaṃ taj jñānaṃ yato brahma paraṃ vidanti BhP_04.16.026/1 tatra tatra giras tās tā iti viśruta-vikramaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1388: BhP_04.16.026/2 śroṣyaty ātmāśritā gāthāḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1393: BhP_04.17.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.17.001/1 evaṃ sa bhagavān vainyaḥ khyāpito guṇa-karmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1394: BhP_04.17.001/2 chandayām āsa tān kāmaiḥ pratipūjyābhinandya ca

GP10bhp_04u:1402: BhP_04.17.005/2 labdhvā jñānaṃ sa-vijñānaṃ rājarṣiḥ kāṃ gatiṃ gataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1403: BhP_04.17.006/1 yac cānyad api kṛṣṇasya bhavān bhagavataḥ prabhoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1405: BhP_04.17.007/1 bhaktāya me 'nuraktāya tava cādhokṣajasya ca
GP10bhp_04u:1406: BhP_04.17.007/2 vaktum arhasi yo 'duhyad vainya-rūpeṇa gām imām BhP_04.17.008/0 sūta uvāca BhP_04.17.008/1 codito vidureṇaivaṃ vāsudeva-kathāṃ prati
GP10bhp_04u:1407: BhP_04.17.008/2 praśasya taṃ prīta-manā maitreyaḥ pratyabhāṣata BhP_04.17.009/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.17.009/1 yadābhiṣiktaḥ pṛthur aṅga viprair āmantrito janatāyāś ca pālaḥ BhP_04.17.009/2 prajā niranne kṣiti-pṛṣṭha etya kṣut-kṣāma-dehāḥ patim abhyavocan BhP_04.17.010/1 vayaṃ rājañ jāṭhareṇābhitaptā yathāgninā koṭara-sthena
GP10bhp_04u:1409: BhP_04.17.010/2 tvām adya yātāḥ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ yaḥ sādhito vṛtti-karaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1410: patir naḥ BhP_04.17.011/1 tan no bhavān īhatu rātave 'nnaṃ kṣudhārditānāṃ
GP10bhp_04u:1412: BhP_04.17.011/2 yāvan na naṅkṣyāmaha ujjhitorjā vārtā-patis tvaṃ kila loka-pālaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1413: BhP_04.17.012/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.17.012/1 pṛthuḥ prajānāṃ karuṇaṃ niśamya paridevitam BhP_04.17.012/2 dīrghaṃ dadhyau kuruśreṣṭha nimittaṃ so 'nvapadyata
GP10bhp_04u:1415: BhP_04.17.013/2 sandadhe viśikhaṃ bhūmeḥ kruddhas tripura-hā yathā
GP10bhp_04u:1416: BhP_04.17.014/1 pravepamānā dharaṇī niśāmyodāyudhaṃ ca tam BhP_04.17.014/2 gauḥ saty apādravad bhītā mṛgīva mṛgayu-drutā
GP10bhp_04u:1417: BhP_04.17.015/1 tām anvadhāvat tad vainyaḥ kupito 'tyaruṇekṣaṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1418: BhP_04.17.015/2 śaraṃ dhanuṣi sandhāya yatra yatra palāyate
GP10bhp_04u:1419: BhP_04.17.016/1 sā diśo vidiśo devī rodasī cāntaraṃ tayoḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1421: BhP_04.17.017/1 loke nāvindata trāṇaṃ vainyān mṛtyor iva prajāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1422: BhP_04.17.017/2 trastā tadā nivavṛte hṛdayena vidūyatā BhP_04.17.018/1 uvāca ca mahā-bhāgaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:1423: BhP_04.17.018/2 trāhi mām api bhūtānāṃ pālane 'vasthito bhavān
GP10bhp_04u:1424: BhP_04.17.019/1 sa tvaṃ jighāṃsase kasmād dīnām akṛta-kilbiṣām
GP10bhp_04u:1425: BhP_04.17.019/2 ahaniṣyat kathaṃ yoṣāṃ dharma-jña iti yo mataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1426: BhP_04.17.020/1 praharanti na vai strīṣu kṛtāgaḥsv api jantavaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1427: BhP_04.17.020/2 kim uta tvad-vidhā rājan karuṇā dīna-vatsalāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1428: BhP_04.17.021/1 māṃ vipāṭyājarāṃ nāvaṃ yatra viśvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GP10bhp_04u:1429: BhP_04.17.021/2 ātmānaṃ ca prajāś cemāḥ katham ambhasi dhāsyasi
GP10bhp_04u:1430: BhP_04.17.022/0 pṛthur uvāca BhP_04.17.022/1 vasudhe tvāṃ vadhiṣyāmi mac-chāsana-parāṅ-mukhīm
GP10bhp_04u:1431: BhP_04.17.022/2 bhāgaṃ barhiṣi yā vṛṅkte na tanoti ca no vasu
GP10bhp_04u:1432: BhP_04.17.023/1 yavasaṃ jagdhy anudinaṃ naiva dogdhy audhasaṃ payaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1433: BhP_04.17.023/2 tasyām evaṃ hi duṣṭāyāṃ daṇḍo nātra na śasyate BhP_04.17.024/1 tvaṃ khalv oṣadhi-bījāni prāk sṛṣṭāni svayambhuvā
GP10bhp_04u:1434: BhP_04.17.024/2 na muñcasy ātma-ruddhāni mām avajñāya manda-dhīḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1435: BhP_04.17.025/1 amūṣāṃ kṣut-parītānām ārtānāṃ paridevitam BhP_04.17.025/2 śamayiṣyāmi mad-bāṇair bhinnāyās tava medasā
GP10bhp_04u:1436: BhP_04.17.026/1 pumān yoṣid uta klība ātma-sambhāvano 'dhamaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1438: BhP_04.17.027/1 tvāṃ stabdhāṃ durmadāṃ nītvā māyā-gāṃ tilaśaḥ śaraiḥ BhP_04.17.027/2 ātma-yoga-balenemā dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ prajāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1439: BhP_04.17.028/1 evaṃ manyumayīṃ mūrtiṃ kṛtāntam iva bibhratam
GP10bhp_04u:1440: BhP_04.17.028/2 praṇatā prāñjaliḥ prāha mahī sañjāta-vepathuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1442: BhP_04.17.029/1 namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya māyayā vinyasta-nānā-tanave
GP10bhp_04u:1446: BhP_04.17.030/1 yenāham ātmāyatanaṃ vinirmitā dhātrā yato 'yaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:1448: BhP_04.17.030/2 sa eva māṃ hantum udāyudhaḥ svarāḍ upasthito 'nyaṃ śaraṇaṃ kam āśraye
GP10bhp_04u:1449: BhP_04.17.031/1 ya etad ādāv asṛjac carācaraṃ sva-māyayātmāśrayayāvitarkyayā
GP10bhp_04u:1450: BhP_04.17.031/2 tayaiva so 'yaṃ kila goptum udyataḥ kathaṃ nu māṃ
GP10bhp_04u:1452: BhP_04.17.032/1 nūnaṃ bateśasya samīhitaṃ janais tan-māyayā
GP10bhp_04u:1454: BhP_04.17.032/2 na lakṣyate yas tv akarod akārayad yo 'neka ekaḥ parataś ca īśvaraḥ BhP_04.17.033/1 sargādi yo 'syānuruṇaddhi śaktibhir
GP10bhp_04u:1456: BhP_04.17.033/2 tasmai samunnaddha-niruddha-śaktaye namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya vedhase BhP_04.17.034/1 sa vai bhavān ātma-vinirmitaṃ jagad
GP10bhp_04u:1458: BhP_04.17.034/2 saṃsthāpayiṣyann aja māṃ rasātalād abhyujjahārāmbhasa ādi-sūkaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1459: BhP_04.17.035/1 apām upasthe mayi nāvy avasthitāḥ prajā bhavān adya rirakṣiṣuḥ kila BhP_04.17.035/2 sa vīra-mūrtiḥ samabhūd dharā-dharo yo māṃ payasy
GP10bhp_04u:1461: BhP_04.17.036/1 nūnaṃ janair īhitam īśvarāṇām asmad-vidhais
GP10bhp_04u:1463: BhP_04.17.036/2 na jñāyate mohita-citta-vartmabhis tebhyo namo vīra-yaśas-karebhyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1464: BhP_04.18.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.18.001/1 itthaṃ pṛthum abhiṣṭūya ruṣā prasphuritādharam BhP_04.18.001/2 punar āhāvanir bhītā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā BhP_04.18.002/1 sanniyacchābhibho manyuṃ nibodha śrāvitaṃ ca me
GP10bhp_04u:1465: BhP_04.18.002/2 sarvataḥ sāram ādatte yathā madhu-karo budhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1467: BhP_04.18.003/2 dṛṣṭā yogāḥ prayuktāś ca puṃsāṃ śreyaḥ-prasiddhaye
GP10bhp_04u:1468: BhP_04.18.004/1 tān ātiṣṭhati yaḥ samyag upāyān pūrva-darśitān
GP10bhp_04u:1470: BhP_04.18.005/1 tān anādṛtya yo 'vidvān arthān ārabhate svayam
GP10bhp_04u:1471: BhP_04.18.005/2 tasya vyabhicaranty arthā ārabdhāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1472: BhP_04.18.006/1 purā sṛṣṭā hy oṣadhayo brahmaṇā yā viśāmpate
GP10bhp_04u:1473: BhP_04.18.006/2 bhujyamānā mayā dṛṣṭā asadbhir adhṛta-vrataiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1476: BhP_04.18.008/1 nūnaṃ tā vīrudhaḥ kṣīṇā mayi kālena bhūyasā
GP10bhp_04u:1477: BhP_04.18.008/2 tatra yogena dṛṣṭena bhavān ādātum arhati
GP10bhp_04u:1478: BhP_04.18.009/1 vatsaṃ kalpaya me vīra yenāhaṃ vatsalā tava
GP10bhp_04u:1479: BhP_04.18.009/2 dhokṣye kṣīramayān kāmān anurūpaṃ ca dohanam
GP10bhp_04u:1480: BhP_04.18.010/1 dogdhāraṃ ca mahā-bāho bhūtānāṃ bhūta-bhāvana
GP10bhp_04u:1481: BhP_04.18.010/2 annam īpsitam ūrjasvad bhagavān vāñchate yadi
GP10bhp_04u:1482: BhP_04.18.011/1 samāṃ ca kuru māṃ rājan deva-vṛṣṭaṃ yathā payaḥ BhP_04.18.011/2 apartāv api bhadraṃ te upāvarteta me vibho
GP10bhp_04u:1483: BhP_04.18.012/1 iti priyaṃ hitaṃ vākyaṃ bhuva ādāya bhūpatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1484: BhP_04.18.012/2 vatsaṃ kṛtvā manuṃ pāṇāv aduhat sakalauṣadhīḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1500: BhP_04.18.022/1 tathāhayo dandaśūkāḥ sarpā nāgāś ca takṣakam
GP10bhp_04u:1501: BhP_04.18.022/2 vidhāya vatsaṃ duduhur bila-pātre viṣaṃ payaḥ BhP_04.18.023/1 paśavo yavasaṃ kṣīraṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā ca go-vṛṣam

GP10bhp_04u:1522: BhP_04.19.003/1 yatra yajña-patiḥ sākṣād bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1527: BhP_04.19.006/1 kapilo nārado datto yogeśāḥ sanakādayaḥ BhP_04.19.006/2 tam anvīyur bhāgavatā ye ca tat-sevanotsukāḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1529: BhP_04.19.007/2 dogdhi smābhīpsitān arthān yajamānasya bhārata BhP_04.19.008/1 ūhuḥ sarva-rasān nadyaḥ kṣīra-dadhy-anna-go-rasān
GP10bhp_04u:1532: BhP_04.19.009/2 upāyanam upājahruḥ sarve lokāḥ sa-pālakāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1533: BhP_04.19.010/1 iti cādhokṣajeśasya pṛthos tu paramodayam BhP_04.19.010/2 asūyan bhagavān indraḥ pratighātam acīkarat BhP_04.19.011/1 carameṇāśvamedhena yajamāne yajuṣ-patim
GP10bhp_04u:1534: BhP_04.19.011/2 vainye yajña-paśuṃ spardhann apovāha tirohitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1535: BhP_04.19.012/1 tam atrir bhagavān aikṣat tvaramāṇaṃ vihāyasā

GP10bhp_04u:1537: BhP_04.19.013/1 atriṇā codito hantuṃ pṛthu-putro mahā-rathaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1538: BhP_04.19.013/2 anvadhāvata saṅkruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt BhP_04.19.014/1 taṃ tādṛśākṛtiṃ vīkṣya mene dharmaṃ śarīriṇam
GP10bhp_04u:1539: BhP_04.19.014/2 jaṭilaṃ bhasmanācchannaṃ tasmai bāṇaṃ na muñcati
GP10bhp_04u:1540: BhP_04.19.015/1 vadhān nivṛttaṃ taṃ bhūyo hantave 'trir acodayat
GP10bhp_04u:1541: BhP_04.19.015/2 jahi yajña-hanaṃ tāta mahendraṃ vibudhādhamam

GP10bhp_04u:1544: BhP_04.19.017/1 so 'śvaṃ rūpaṃ ca tad dhitvā tasmā antarhitaḥ svarāṭ
GP10bhp_04u:1545: BhP_04.19.017/2 vīraḥ sva-paśum ādāya pitur yajñam upeyivān
GP10bhp_04u:1546: BhP_04.19.018/1 tat tasya cādbhutaṃ karma vicakṣya paramarṣayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1547: BhP_04.19.018/2 nāmadheyaṃ dadus tasmai vijitāśva iti prabho

GP10bhp_04u:1551: BhP_04.19.021/1 atriṇā coditas tasmai sandadhe viśikhaṃ ruṣā
GP10bhp_04u:1552: BhP_04.19.021/2 so 'śvaṃ rūpaṃ ca tad dhitvā tasthāv antarhitaḥ svarāṭ
GP10bhp_04u:1553: BhP_04.19.022/1 vīraś cāśvam upādāya pitṛ-yajñam athāvrajat
GP10bhp_04u:1554: BhP_04.19.022/2 tad avadyaṃ hare rūpaṃ jagṛhur jñāna-durbalāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1555: BhP_04.19.023/1 yāni rūpāṇi jagṛhe indro haya-jihīrṣayā

GP10bhp_04u:1561: BhP_04.19.026/1 tad abhijñāya bhagavān pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1563: BhP_04.19.027/1 tam ṛtvijaḥ śakra-vadhābhisandhitaṃ vicakṣya duṣprekṣyam asahya-raṃhasam
GP10bhp_04u:1564: BhP_04.19.027/2 nivārayām āsur aho mahā-mate na yujyate 'trānya-vadhaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1570: BhP_04.19.029/1 ity āmantrya kratu-patiṃ vidurāsyartvijo ruṣā BhP_04.19.029/2 srug-ghastān juhvato 'bhyetya svayambhūḥ pratyaṣedhata BhP_04.19.030/1 na vadhyo bhavatām indro yad yajño bhagavat-tanuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1571: BhP_04.19.030/2 yaṃ jighāṃsatha yajñena yasyeṣṭās tanavaḥ surāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1572: BhP_04.19.031/1 tad idaṃ paśyata mahad- dharma-vyatikaraṃ dvijāḥ

GP10bhp_04u:1576: BhP_04.19.033/1 naivātmane mahendrāya roṣam āhartum arhasi BhP_04.19.033/2 ubhāv api hi bhadraṃ te uttamaśloka-vigrahau
GP10bhp_04u:1577: BhP_04.19.034/1 māsmin mahārāja kṛthāḥ sma cintāṃ niśāmayāsmad-vaca

GP10bhp_04u:1582: BhP_04.19.037/1 bhavān paritrātum ihāvatīrṇo dharmaṃ janānāṃ samayānurūpam

GP10bhp_04u:1596: BhP_04.20.002/1 eṣa te 'kārṣīd bhaṅgaṃ haya-medha-śatasya ha
GP10bhp_04u:1597: BhP_04.20.002/2 kṣamāpayata ātmānam amuṣya kṣantum arhasi BhP_04.20.003/1 sudhiyaḥ sādhavo loke naradeva narottamāḥ BhP_04.20.003/2 nābhidruhyanti bhūtebhyo yarhi nātmā kalevaram BhP_04.20.004/1 puruṣā yadi muhyanti tvādṛśā deva-māyayā

GP10bhp_04u:1601: BhP_04.20.006/1 asaṃsaktaḥ śarīre 'sminn amunotpādite gṛhe BhP_04.20.006/2 apatye draviṇe vāpi kaḥ kuryān mamatāṃ budhaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1602: BhP_04.20.007/1 ekaḥ śuddhaḥ svayaṃ-jyotir nirguṇo 'sau guṇāśrayaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1604: BhP_04.20.008/1 ya evaṃ santam ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ veda pūruṣaḥ BhP_04.20.008/2 nājyate prakṛti-stho 'pi tad-guṇaiḥ sa mayi sthitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1605: BhP_04.20.009/1 yaḥ sva-dharmeṇa māṃ nityaṃ nirāśīḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1606: BhP_04.20.009/2 bhajate śanakais tasya mano rājan prasīdati
GP10bhp_04u:1608: BhP_04.20.010/2 śāntiṃ me samavasthānaṃ brahma kaivalyam aśnute
GP10bhp_04u:1610: BhP_04.20.011/2 kūṭa-stham imam ātmānaṃ yo vedāpnoti śobhanam BhP_04.20.012/1 bhinnasya liṅgasya guṇa-pravāho
GP10bhp_04u:1612: BhP_04.20.012/2 dṛṣṭāsu sampatsu vipatsu sūrayo na vikriyante mayi
GP10bhp_04u:1614: BhP_04.20.013/1 samaḥ samānottama-madhyamādhamaḥ sukhe ca duḥkhe ca jitendriyāśayaḥ BhP_04.20.013/2 mayopakḷptākhila-loka-saṃyuto vidhatsva
GP10bhp_04u:1616: BhP_04.20.014/1 śreyaḥ prajā-pālanam eva rājño yat sāmparāye sukṛtāt ṣaṣṭham aṃśam BhP_04.20.014/2 hartānyathā hṛta-puṇyaḥ prajānām arakṣitā kara-hāro 'gham
GP10bhp_04u:1620: BhP_04.20.015/2 hrasvena kālena gṛhopayātān draṣṭāsi siddhān anurakta-lokaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1621: BhP_04.20.016/1 varaṃ ca mat kañcana mānavendra vṛṇīṣva te 'haṃ
GP10bhp_04u:1623: BhP_04.20.016/2 nāhaṃ makhair vai sulabhas tapobhir yogena vā yat sama-citta-vartī
GP10bhp_04u:1624: BhP_04.20.017/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.20.017/1 sa itthaṃ loka-guruṇā viṣvaksenena viśva-jit
GP10bhp_04u:1625: BhP_04.20.017/2 anuśāsita ādeśaṃ śirasā jagṛhe hareḥ BhP_04.20.018/1 spṛśantaṃ pādayoḥ premṇā vrīḍitaṃ svena karmaṇā
GP10bhp_04u:1626: BhP_04.20.018/2 śata-kratuṃ pariṣvajya vidveṣaṃ visasarja ha
GP10bhp_04u:1630: BhP_04.20.020/2 paśyan padma-palāśākṣo na pratasthe suhṛt satām
GP10bhp_04u:1631: BhP_04.20.021/1 sa ādi-rājo racitāñjalir hariṃ vilokituṃ nāśakad
GP10bhp_04u:1633: BhP_04.20.021/2 na kiñcanovāca sa bāṣpa-viklavo hṛdopaguhyāmum adhād avasthitaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1634: BhP_04.20.022/1 athāvamṛjyāśru-kalā vilokayann atṛpta-dṛg-gocaram āha pūruṣam BhP_04.20.022/2 padā spṛśantaṃ kṣitim aṃsa unnate vinyasta-hastāgram
GP10bhp_04u:1636: BhP_04.20.023/0 pṛthur uvāca BhP_04.20.023/1 varān vibho tvad varadeśvarād budhaḥ kathaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:1638: BhP_04.20.023/2 ye nārakāṇām api santi dehināṃ tān īśa kaivalya-pate vṛṇe na ca
GP10bhp_04u:1639: BhP_04.20.024/1 na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṃ kvacin na yatra
GP10bhp_04u:1641: BhP_04.20.024/2 mahattamāntar-hṛdayān mukha-cyuto vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa
GP10bhp_04u:1642: me varaḥ BhP_04.20.025/1 sa uttamaśloka mahan-mukha-cyuto bhavat-padāmbhoja-sudhā
GP10bhp_04u:1644: BhP_04.20.025/2 smṛtiṃ punar vismṛta-tattva-vartmanāṃ kuyogināṃ no vitaraty alaṃ varaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:1645: BhP_04.20.026/1 yaśaḥ śivaṃ suśrava ārya-saṅgame yadṛcchayā copaśṛṇoti te
GP10bhp_04u:1647: BhP_04.20.026/2 kathaṃ guṇa-jño viramed vinā paśuṃ śrīr yat pravavre
GP10bhp_04u:1651: BhP_04.20.027/2 apy āvayor eka-pati-spṛdhoḥ kalir na syāt
GP10bhp_04u:1653: BhP_04.20.028/1 jagaj-jananyāṃ jagad-īśa vaiśasaṃ syād eva yat-karmaṇi naḥ samīhitam BhP_04.20.028/2 karoṣi phalgv apy uru dīna-vatsalaḥ sva eva dhiṣṇye
GP10bhp_04u:1654: 'bhiratasya kiṃ tayā BhP_04.20.029/1 bhajanty atha tvām ata eva sādhavo
GP10bhp_04u:1656: BhP_04.20.029/2 bhavat-padānusmaraṇād ṛte satāṃ nimittam anyad bhagavan na
GP10bhp_04u:1658: BhP_04.20.030/1 manye giraṃ te jagatāṃ vimohinīṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti bhajantam āttha yat BhP_04.20.030/2 vācā nu tantyā yadi te jano 'sitaḥ kathaṃ punaḥ karma
GP10bhp_04u:1659: karoti mohitaḥ BhP_04.20.031/1 tvan-māyayāddhā jana īśa khaṇḍito yad anyad āśāsta
GP10bhp_04u:1661: BhP_04.20.031/2 yathā cared bāla-hitaṃ pitā svayaṃ tathā tvam evārhasi naḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2286: BhP_04.27.003/2 na kāla-raṃho bubudhe duratyayaṃ divā niśeti

GP10bhp_04u:2297: BhP_04.27.008/2 dāraiḥ saṃyojayām āsa duhitṝḥ sadṛśair varaiḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2322: BhP_04.27.027/1 kāla-kanyodita-vaco niśamya yavaneśvaraḥ BhP_04.27.027/2 cikīrṣur deva-guhyaṃ sa sasmitaṃ tām abhāṣata
GP10bhp_04u:2323: BhP_04.27.028/1 mayā nirūpitas tubhyaṃ patir ātma-samādhinā

GP10bhp_04u:2331: BhP_04.28.002/1 ta ekadā tu rabhasā purañjana-purīṃ nṛpa

GP10bhp_04u:2363: BhP_04.28.021/2 vartiṣyante mayi gate bhinna-nāva ivodadhau

GP10bhp_04u:2371: BhP_04.28.026/2 kuṭhāraiś cicchiduḥ kruddhāḥ smaranto 'mīvam asya tat BhP_04.28.027/1 ananta-pāre tamasi magno naṣṭa-smṛtiḥ samāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2373: BhP_04.28.028/1 tām eva manasā gṛhṇan babhūva pramadottamā

GP10bhp_04u:2382: BhP_04.28.035/1 tatra candravasā nāma tāmraparṇī vaṭodakā BhP_04.28.035/2 tat-puṇya-salilair nityam ubhayatrātmano mṛjan
GP10bhp_04u:2384: BhP_04.28.036/2 vartamānaḥ śanair gātra- karśanaṃ tapa āsthitaḥ

GP10bhp_04u:2396: BhP_04.28.044/2 babhāv upa patiṃ śāntā śikhā śāntam ivānalam

GP10bhp_04u:2401: BhP_04.28.048/2 dasyubhyaḥ kṣatra-bandhubhyo bibhyatīṃ pātum arhasi

GP10bhp_04u:2406: BhP_04.28.051/2 sāntvayan valgunā sāmnā tām āha rudatīṃ prabho

GP10bhp_04u:2408: BhP_04.28.053/1 api smarasi cātmānam avijñāta-sakhaṃ sakhe

GP10bhp_04u:2419: BhP_04.28.058/2 śakty-adhīśaḥ pumāṃs tv atra praviṣṭo nāvabudhyate BhP_04.28.059/1 tasmiṃs tvaṃ rāmayā spṛṣṭo ramamāṇo 'śruta-smṛtiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2420: BhP_04.28.059/2 tat-saṅgād īdṛśīṃ prāpto daśāṃ pāpīyasīṃ prabho BhP_04.28.060/1 na tvaṃ vidarbha-duhitā nāyaṃ vīraḥ suhṛt tava

GP10bhp_04u:2611: BhP_04.30.011/1 yad yūyaṃ pitur ādeśam agrahīṣṭa mudānvitāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2612: BhP_04.30.011/2 atho va uśatī kīrtir lokān anu bhaviṣyati
GP10bhp_04u:2613: BhP_04.30.012/1 bhavitā viśrutaḥ putro 'navamo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ BhP_04.30.012/2 ya etām ātma-vīryeṇa tri-lokīṃ pūrayiṣyati
GP10bhp_04u:2614: BhP_04.30.013/1 kaṇḍoḥ pramlocayā labdhā kanyā kamala-locanā
GP10bhp_04u:2615: BhP_04.30.013/2 tāṃ cāpaviddhāṃ jagṛhur bhūruhā nṛpa-nandanāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2616: BhP_04.30.014/1 kṣut-kṣāmāyā mukhe rājā somaḥ pīyūṣa-varṣiṇīm
GP10bhp_04u:2617: BhP_04.30.014/2 deśinīṃ rodamānāyā nidadhe sa dayānvitaḥ BhP_04.30.015/1 prajā-visarga ādiṣṭāḥ pitrā mām anuvartatā
GP10bhp_04u:2618: BhP_04.30.015/2 tatra kanyāṃ varārohāṃ tām udvahata mā ciram
GP10bhp_04u:2621: BhP_04.30.017/1 divya-varṣa-sahasrāṇāṃ sahasram ahataujasaḥ BhP_04.30.017/2 bhaumān bhokṣyatha bhogān vai divyāṃś cānugrahān mama
GP10bhp_04u:2622: BhP_04.30.018/1 atha mayy anapāyinyā bhaktyā pakva-guṇāśayāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2623: BhP_04.30.018/2 upayāsyatha mad-dhāma nirvidya nirayād ataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2624: BhP_04.30.019/1 gṛheṣv āviśatāṃ cāpi puṃsāṃ kuśala-karmaṇām
GP10bhp_04u:2625: BhP_04.30.019/2 mad-vārtā-yāta-yāmānāṃ na bandhāya gṛhā matāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2626: BhP_04.30.020/1 navyavad dhṛdaye yaj jño brahmaitad brahma-vādibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2627: BhP_04.30.020/2 na muhyanti na śocanti na hṛṣyanti yato gatāḥ BhP_04.30.021/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.30.021/1 evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ puruṣārtha-bhājanaṃ janārdanaṃ prāñjalayaḥ pracetasaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2629: BhP_04.30.022/0 pracetasa ūcuḥ BhP_04.30.022/1 namo namaḥ kleśa-vināśanāya nirūpitodāra-guṇāhvayāya
GP10bhp_04u:2630: BhP_04.30.022/2 mano-vaco-vega-puro-javāya sarvākṣa-mārgair agatādhvane namaḥ BhP_04.30.023/1 śuddhāya śāntāya namaḥ sva-niṣṭhayā manasy apārthaṃ vilasad-dvayāya
GP10bhp_04u:2635: BhP_04.30.025/2 namaḥ kamala-pādāya namas te kamalekṣaṇa
GP10bhp_04u:2638: BhP_04.30.027/1 rūpaṃ bhagavatā tv etad aśeṣa-kleśa-saṅkṣayam
GP10bhp_04u:2639: BhP_04.30.027/2 āviṣkṛtaṃ naḥ kliṣṭānāṃ kim anyad anukampitam
GP10bhp_04u:2640: BhP_04.30.028/1 etāvat tvaṃ hi vibhubhir bhāvyaṃ dīneṣu vatsalaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2643: BhP_04.30.029/2 antarhito 'ntar-hṛdaye kasmān no veda nāśiṣaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2644: BhP_04.30.030/1 asāv eva varo 'smākam īpsito jagataḥ pate
GP10bhp_04u:2645: BhP_04.30.030/2 prasanno bhagavān yeṣām apavargaḥ gurur gatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2646: BhP_04.30.031/1 varaṃ vṛṇīmahe 'thāpi nātha tvat parataḥ parāt
GP10bhp_04u:2647: BhP_04.30.031/2 na hy antas tvad-vibhūtīnāṃ so 'nanta iti gīyase BhP_04.30.032/1 pārijāte 'ñjasā labdhe sāraṅgo 'nyan na sevate BhP_04.30.032/2 tvad-aṅghri-mūlam āsādya sākṣāt kiṃ kiṃ vṛṇīmahi BhP_04.30.033/1 yāvat te māyayā spṛṣṭā bhramāma iha karmabhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2648: BhP_04.30.033/2 tāvad bhavat-prasaṅgānāṃ saṅgaḥ syān no bhave bhave BhP_04.30.034/1 tulayāma lavenāpi na svargaṃ nāpunar-bhavam
GP10bhp_04u:2650: BhP_04.30.035/1 yatreḍyante kathā mṛṣṭās tṛṣṇāyāḥ praśamo yataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2651: BhP_04.30.035/2 nirvairaṃ yatra bhūteṣu nodvego yatra kaścana
GP10bhp_04u:2652: BhP_04.30.036/1 yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣād bhagavān nyāsināṃ gatiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2653: BhP_04.30.036/2 saṃstūyate sat-kathāsu mukta-saṅgaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ BhP_04.30.037/1 teṣāṃ vicaratāṃ padbhyāṃ tīrthānāṃ pāvanecchayā BhP_04.30.037/2 bhītasya kiṃ na roceta tāvakānāṃ samāgamaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2654: BhP_04.30.038/1 vayaṃ tu sākṣād bhagavan bhavasya priyasya sakhyuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2656: BhP_04.30.038/2 suduścikitsyasya bhavasya mṛtyor bhiṣaktamaṃ tvādya gatiṃ
GP10bhp_04u:2657: gatāḥ sma BhP_04.30.039/1 yan naḥ svadhītaṃ guravaḥ prasāditā viprāś ca vṛddhāś ca
GP10bhp_04u:2659: BhP_04.30.039/2 āryā natāḥ suhṛdo bhrātaraś ca sarvāṇi bhūtāny anasūyayaiva BhP_04.30.040/1 yan naḥ sutaptaṃ tapa etad īśa nirandhasāṃ kālam adabhram
GP10bhp_04u:2661: BhP_04.30.040/2 sarvaṃ tad etat puruṣasya bhūmno vṛṇīmahe te paritoṣaṇāya BhP_04.30.041/1 manuḥ svayambhūr bhagavān bhavaś ca ye 'nye
GP10bhp_04u:2663: BhP_04.30.041/2 adṛṣṭa-pārā api yan-mahimnaḥ stuvanty atho tvātma-samaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:2665: BhP_04.30.042/1 namaḥ samāya śuddhāya puruṣāya parāya ca
GP10bhp_04u:2666: BhP_04.30.042/2 vāsudevāya sattvāya tubhyaṃ bhagavate namaḥ BhP_04.30.043/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.30.043/1 iti pracetobhir abhiṣṭuto hariḥ prītas tathety āha
GP10bhp_04u:2670: BhP_04.30.044/1 atha niryāya salilāt pracetasa udanvataḥ BhP_04.30.044/2 vīkṣyākupyan drumaiś channāṃ gāṃ gāṃ roddhum ivocchritaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2671: BhP_04.30.045/1 tato 'gni-mārutau rājann amuñcan mukhato ruṣā
GP10bhp_04u:2672: BhP_04.30.045/2 mahīṃ nirvīrudhaṃ kartuṃ saṃvartaka ivātyaye BhP_04.30.046/1 bhasmasāt kriyamāṇāṃs tān drumān vīkṣya pitāmahaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2673: BhP_04.30.046/2 āgataḥ śamayām āsa putrān barhiṣmato nayaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2674: BhP_04.30.047/1 tatrāvaśiṣṭā ye vṛkṣā bhītā duhitaraṃ tadā
GP10bhp_04u:2675: BhP_04.30.047/2 ujjahrus te pracetobhya upadiṣṭāḥ svayambhuvā BhP_04.30.048/1 te ca brahmaṇa ādeśān māriṣām upayemire
GP10bhp_04u:2677: BhP_04.30.049/1 cākṣuṣe tv antare prāpte prāk-sarge kāla-vidrute
GP10bhp_04u:2678: BhP_04.30.049/2 yaḥ sasarja prajā iṣṭāḥ sa dakṣo daiva-coditaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2679: BhP_04.30.050/1 yo jāyamānaḥ sarveṣāṃ tejas tejasvināṃ rucā
GP10bhp_04u:2680: BhP_04.30.050/2 svayopādatta dākṣyāc ca karmaṇāṃ dakṣam abruvan
GP10bhp_04u:2681: BhP_04.30.051/1 taṃ prajā-sarga-rakṣāyām anādir abhiṣicya ca
GP10bhp_04u:2682: BhP_04.30.051/2 yuyoja yuyuje 'nyāṃś ca sa vai sarva-prajāpatīn
GP10bhp_04u:2683: BhP_04.31.001/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.31.001/1 tata utpanna-vijñānā āśv adhokṣaja-bhāṣitam
GP10bhp_04u:2684: BhP_04.31.001/2 smaranta ātmaje bhāryāṃ visṛjya prāvrajan gṛhāt
GP10bhp_04u:2686: BhP_04.31.002/2 pratīcyāṃ diśi velāyāṃ siddho 'bhūd yatra jājaliḥ BhP_04.31.003/1 tān nirjita-prāṇa-mano-vaco-dṛśo
GP10bhp_04u:2688: BhP_04.31.003/2 pare 'male brahmaṇi yojitātmanaḥ surāsureḍyo dadṛśe sma nāradaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2689: BhP_04.31.004/1 tam āgataṃ ta utthāya praṇipatyābhinandya ca
GP10bhp_04u:2691: BhP_04.31.005/0 pracetasa ūcuḥ BhP_04.31.005/1 svāgataṃ te surarṣe 'dya diṣṭyā no darśanaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:2692: BhP_04.31.005/2 tava caṅkramaṇaṃ brahmann abhayāya yathā raveḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2693: BhP_04.31.006/1 yad ādiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā śivenādhokṣajena ca BhP_04.31.006/2 tad gṛheṣu prasaktānāṃ prāyaśaḥ kṣapitaṃ prabho
GP10bhp_04u:2694: BhP_04.31.007/1 tan naḥ pradyotayādhyātma- jñānaṃ tattvārtha-darśanam
GP10bhp_04u:2696: BhP_04.31.008/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.31.008/1 iti pracetasāṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān nārado muniḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2697: BhP_04.31.008/2 bhagavaty uttama-śloka āviṣṭātmābravīn nṛpān BhP_04.31.009/0 nārada uvāca BhP_04.31.009/1 taj janma tāni karmāṇi tad āyus tan mano vacaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2698: BhP_04.31.009/2 nṛṇāṃ yena hi viśvātmā sevyate harir īśvaraḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2699: BhP_04.31.010/1 kiṃ janmabhis tribhir veha śaukra-sāvitra-yājñikaiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2700: BhP_04.31.010/2 karmabhir vā trayī-proktaiḥ puṃso 'pi vibudhāyuṣā
GP10bhp_04u:2701: BhP_04.31.011/1 śrutena tapasā vā kiṃ vacobhiś citta-vṛttibhiḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2702: BhP_04.31.011/2 buddhyā vā kiṃ nipuṇayā balenendriya-rādhasā
GP10bhp_04u:2703: BhP_04.31.012/1 kiṃ vā yogena sāṅkhyena nyāsa-svādhyāyayor api
GP10bhp_04u:2704: BhP_04.31.012/2 kiṃ vā śreyobhir anyaiś ca na yatrātma-prado hariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2705: BhP_04.31.013/1 śreyasām api sarveṣām ātmā hy avadhir arthataḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2706: BhP_04.31.013/2 sarveṣām api bhūtānāṃ harir ātmātmadaḥ priyaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2709: BhP_04.31.014/2 prāṇopahārāc ca yathendriyāṇāṃ tathaiva sarvārhaṇam acyutejyā
GP10bhp_04u:2710: BhP_04.31.015/1 yathaiva sūryāt prabhavanti vāraḥ punaś ca tasmin praviśanti kāle
GP10bhp_04u:2711: BhP_04.31.015/2 bhūtāni bhūmau sthira-jaṅgamāni tathā harāv eva
GP10bhp_04u:2713: BhP_04.31.016/1 etat padaṃ taj jagad-ātmanaḥ paraṃ sakṛd vibhātaṃ savitur yathā prabhā
GP10bhp_04u:2716: BhP_04.31.017/1 yathā nabhasy abhra-tamaḥ-prakāśā bhavanti bhūpā na
GP10bhp_04u:2717: bhavanty anukramāt BhP_04.31.017/2 evaṃ pare brahmaṇi śaktayas tv amū rajas tamaḥ sattvam iti pravāhaḥ BhP_04.31.018/1 tenaikam ātmānam aśeṣa-dehināṃ kālaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ
GP10bhp_04u:2720: bhajadhvam addhā BhP_04.31.019/1 dayayā sarva-bhūteṣu santuṣṭyā yena kena vā
GP10bhp_04u:2721: BhP_04.31.019/2 sarvendriyopaśāntyā ca tuṣyaty āśu janārdanaḥ BhP_04.31.020/1 apahata-sakalaiṣaṇāmalātmany
GP10bhp_04u:2723: BhP_04.31.020/2 nija-jana-vaśa-gatvam ātmano 'yan na sarati chidravad
GP10bhp_04u:2725: BhP_04.31.021/1 na bhajati kumanīṣiṇāṃ sa ijyāṃ harir
GP10bhp_04u:2727: BhP_04.31.021/2 śruta-dhana-kula-karmaṇāṃ madair ye vidadhati pāpam akiñcaneṣu satsu
GP10bhp_04u:2728: BhP_04.31.022/1 śriyam anucaratīṃ tad-arthinaś ca dvipada-patīn vibudhāṃś ca yat sva-pūrṇaḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2729: BhP_04.31.022/2 na bhajati nija-bhṛtya-varga-tantraḥ katham amum udvisṛjet
GP10bhp_04u:2731: BhP_04.31.023/0 maitreya uvāca BhP_04.31.023/1 iti pracetaso rājann anyāś ca bhagavat-kathāḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2732: BhP_04.31.023/2 śrāvayitvā brahma-lokaṃ yayau svāyambhuvo muniḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2734: BhP_04.31.024/2 harer niśamya tat-pādaṃ dhyāyantas tad-gatiṃ yayuḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2735: BhP_04.31.025/1 etat te 'bhihitaṃ kṣattar yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛṣṭavān BhP_04.31.025/2 pracetasāṃ nāradasya saṃvādaṃ hari-kīrtanam
GP10bhp_04u:2739: BhP_04.31.027/1 yo nāradād ātma-vidyām adhigamya punar mahīm
GP10bhp_04u:2740: BhP_04.31.027/2 bhuktvā vibhajya putrebhya aiśvaraṃ samagāt padam
GP10bhp_04u:2745: BhP_04.31.029/0 vidura uvāca BhP_04.31.029/1 so 'yam adya mahā-yogin bhavatā karuṇātmanā BhP_04.31.029/2 darśitas tamasaḥ pāro yatrākiñcana-go hariḥ
GP10bhp_04u:2747: BhP_04.31.030/1 ity ānamya tam āmantrya viduro gajasāhvayam
GP10bhp_04u:2748: BhP_04.31.030/2 svānāṃ didṛkṣuḥ prayayau jñātīnāṃ nirvṛtāśayaḥ BhP_04.31.031/1 etad yaḥ śṛṇuyād rājan rājñāṃ hary-arpitātmanām
GP10bhp_04u:2749: BhP_04.31.031/2 āyur dhanaṃ yaśaḥ svasti gatim aiśvaryam āpnuyāt
